items.name: Poke Ball
items.effects: A device for catching wild Pokemon

items.name: Super Ball
items.effects: A good, high-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a standard Poke Ball.

items.name: Ultra Ball
items.effects: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a Great Ball.

items.name: Master Ball
items.effects: It will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.

items.name: Carbos
items.effects: Carbos increases a Pokémon's EVs in Speed by 10, up to a maximum of 100.

items.name: Water Stone
items.effects: The Water Stone causes a Pokemon to evolve.

items.name: Thunder Stone
items.effects: The Thunder Stone causes a Pokemon to evolve.

items.name: Ice Stone
items.effects: The Ice Stone causes a Pokemon to evolve.

items.name: Leaf Stone
items.effects: The Leaf Stone causes a Pokemon to evolve.
